MS MCQs

    Get started with AI Builder licensing

    »

    1. To use the premium AI Builder feature, you only need to get AI Builder capacity. (True or False)

      This statement is true.

      This statement is false.


    2. Which of the following features can you access with an AI Builder trial?

      Only included scenarios (such as a preview)

      Included scenarios and some premium features

      All included and premium features, but with limited capacity


    3. Which of the following products must you purchase to acquire additional AI Builder credits?

      AI Builder Credits add-on

      AI Builder Capacity

      AI Builder Capacity add-on


    4. Which of the following products can you use to estimate the number of add-ons to purchase?

      AI Builder Calculator

      Excel, and try to guess the burning rate of each scenario

      Azure Pricing Calculator


    5. Which of the following statements is true about allocation of AI Builder credits to an environment?

      It is not necessary because credits can be consumed directly at tenant level.

      It happens in Power Platform admin center and is mandatory to use with purchased capacity.

      It must be redone at the beginning of each month.
